name: Rachel Lessard
title: Owner & Founder
bio: With certifications in esthetics, energy work, and integrative wellness practices, Rachel established Pathways Within Wellness to create a sanctuary where clients can heal, grow, and embrace their most authentic self.

name: Christine Cervo
title: Massage Therapist
bio: With an extensive background in massage therapy, Christine specializes in Swedish, deep tissue, sports, prenatal massage, and energy work modalities.

name: Nicole Imbasciani
title: Medical Director
bio: With a background in nursing and medical aesthetics, Nicole brings clinical expertise and medical oversight to ensure the safety and efficacy of all medical-grade treatments.

name: Evelina Abayev
title: Registered Nurse
bio: Evelina is passionate about helping clients achieve their wellness and beauty goals through medical-grade treatments administered with clinical precision and compassionate care.

name: Angela Gestone
title: Esthetician
bio: Angela has been in the beauty industry for several years with extensive knowledge in skincare treatments including facials, chemical peels, and advanced skincare modalities.

name: Gloria Saladino
title: Front Desk Manager
bio: Gloria is the welcoming face of Pathways Within, ensuring every client has a positive experience from their very first call to checkout.
